## Open Science Principles {.smaller}

<hr color = #CADC30>

::: columns
::: {.incremental .column width="32%"}
1.  Accessible
    -   Open access literature
    -   Open source software
    -   Public data repository
2.  Reproducible
    -   Open Collaboration
    -   Open Tools
3.  Inclusive
    -   New Pathways to Science
    -   Expand Participation
:::

## Open Science at RIBBiTR {.smaller auto-animate="true"}

<hr color = #CADC30>

::: columns
::: {.column width="42%"}
<h2 style="font-size: 16.0pt;">

1.  Accessible
    -   Cloud based PostgreSQL Database
    -   Database made public upon grant completion
    -   RStudio (R), Jupyter Lab (Python), and DBeaver (PostgreSQL)
    -   Published papers unlocked?

</h2>

::: {.fragment .fade-in}
<h2 style="font-size: 16.0pt;">

2.  Reproducible
    -   Reproducible analysis in R and Python
    -   Quarto manuscripts, documents, and presentations
    -   Collaboration with Git/Github in RStudio (R) and Jupyter Notebook (Python)

</h2>
:::

::: {.fragment .fade-in}
<h2 style="font-size: 16.0pt;">
